item.title: After Sunrise On The Reaping, I Want More Than Ever To Read Prequels About These Two Characters
item.description: After Sunrise on the Reaping, I am eager to know what might have happened during Finnick and Johanna's Games that the Capitol covered up.

item.title: Jason Momoa Confirms Dune 3 Return
item.description: Jason Momoa confirms his return for Dune: Part Three, revealing he will be coming back as Duncan Idaho in the forthcoming sci-fi sequel.

item.title: I'm Glad Weâ€™re Getting The Real Luke Hobbs In Fast 11 After Fast & Furious' The Rock Replacement Didn't Work
item.description: Hobbs' return in the upcoming Fast 11 means it makes perfect sense why the character's replacement from Fast 9 and Fast X was killed off.
